title: Denmark
brief_description: Denmark yesterday and today. After giving an idea of the appearance of Denmark the film outlines its history, showing burial mounds of the Bronze Age, and the appearance of churches and other buildings at different times. Also includes footage of the industries, sports and social services of Denmark today; views of Copenhagen; and the coronation of King Frederick.
